quote: Don’t feel shy—kiss. Kiss just to feel the joy of life and to get lost in the beauty of love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: thus with a kiss I die
author: William Shakespeare,  Romeo and Juliet

quote: A kiss is a flower of love, a sweet song of two hearts, and a memory of eternal desires.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Kiss me, and you will see how important I am.
author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath

quote: Kiss me with love like a butterfly kisses flowers to find and taste the nectar of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A kiss is a rosy dot over the 'i' of loving.
author: Cyrano de Bergerac

quote: one transcendent kissthat later makes lovers takesoft breaths, holding hands
author: Lori L. Otto,  Lost and Found

quote: A kiss may ruin a human life
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: We kiss all the time."I clear my throat, then add, "We just...do it in private.""A smug expression crosses his face. "I don't buy it for a second, 'cause if you were my girlfriend and a stud like me was livin' in your house, I'd kiss you in front of the guy every chance I got as a reminder.""A reminder of w-w-what?""That you were mine.
author: Simone Elkeles,  Rules of Attraction

quote: Kissing - and I mean like, yummy, smacking kissing - is the most delicious, most beautiful and passionate thing that two people can do, bar none. Better than sex, hands down.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: We kiss again. This next kiss is the kind that breaks open the sky. It steals my breath and gives it back. It shows me that every other kiss I've had in my life has been wrong.
author: Gayle Forman,  Just One Day

quote: My God,' he gasped, 'you're fun to kiss.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  Tender Is the Night

quote: Life is short. Kiss slowly, laugh insanely, love truly and forgive quickly
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: The mouth is made for communication, and nothing is more articulate than a kiss.
author: Jarod Kintz,  It Occurred to Me

quote: Kisses open doors, I've noticed. That one gesture can unlock secrets, ease open feelings. It can't be prevented--these kisses just are. It's how they work. They break into basements you never knew you had.
author: Susan Fletcher,  Eve Green

quote: When soul risesInto lipsYou feel the kiss You have wanted
author: Rumi

quote: The decision to kiss for the first time is the most crucial in any love story. It changes the relationship of two people much more strongly than even the final surrender; because this kiss already has within it that surrender.
author: Emil Ludwig

quote: To enjoy the nectar of life, I like to kiss you like a beautiful bee kisses the flower.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Say This to Her/Him and Just See What Happens... *I want to kiss you in places I've never kissed you before.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous.
author: Ingrid Bergman

quote: Remember, we're madly in love, so it's all right to kiss me anytime you feel like it.
author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games

quote: A blooming flower pleads, oh thee! Look at me,  to see the beauty, Kiss me like a bee,  To feel the bliss, To taste the nectar of life And just to feel and be. Kiss me like a wave kisses the shore In an endless dancing sea, again and again, just to be.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: you can take this mouththis wound you wantbut you can't kissand make itbetter.
author: Daphne Gottlieb,  Why Things Burn

quote: If we’re going to kiss, it has to be book-worthy.
author: Colleen Hoover,  November 9

quote: I love kiss whispers—kisspers. Loose lips are full of passionate secrets.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: If we spoke with our ears, and listened through our mouth, then a kiss might be the most romantic sound in the world.
author: Jarod Kintz,  American Association for the Advancement of Aardvarks Presents: Dear Natalie

quote: I wanted to kiss you like the waves kiss the shore under the blue sky.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I didn't care who kissed you first as long as I kissed you last."-George from If We Kiss
author: Rachel Vail,  If We Kiss

quote: All you have to go on is the faith of a kiss.
author: Whitney Otto,  How to Make an American Quilt

quote: Love's Kiss of Death [10w] Love's kiss of death is taking each another for granted.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: I might kiss you.I might be bad at it.That's not possible.
author: Nicholas Sparks,  A Walk to Remember

quote: Stolen kisses are always sweetest.
author: Leigh Hunt

quote: I really can't think about kissing when I've got a rebellion to incite.
author: Suzanne Collins,  Catching Fire

quote: At some point, our lips met and it was perhaps the most wonderful thing I'd ever experienced. And truly, I guess there wasn't just one kiss, but several. A polite frenzy. A mass migration of delicate wildebeest kisses. I remember them as one transcendent event, though.
author: Dean Hale

quote: What would you do if I kissed you right now?"I stared at his beautiful face and his beautiful mouth and I wanted nothing more than to taste it. "I would kiss you back.
author: Michelle Hodkin,  The Unbecoming of Mara Dyer

quote: More than kisses, letters mingle souls.
author: John Donne

quote: But one kiss levitates above all the others. Theintersection of function and desire. The I do kiss.The I’ll love you through a brick wall kiss.Even when I’m dead, I’ll swim through the Earth,like a mermaid of the soil, just to be next to your bones.
author: Jeffrey McDaniel

quote: I didn't want to kiss you goodbye — that was the trouble — I wanted to kiss you good night — and there's a lot of difference.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: This time when we kiss, I feel it in the pit of my stomach, I feel it in my heart. And I realize love isn't about sex. It's about connection.
author: Ellen Hopkins

quote: As far as I can tell, there are two basic (kissing) rules: 1. Don't bite anything without permission. 2. The human tongue is like wasabi: it's very powerful, and should be used sparingly.
author: John Green,  Paper Towns

quote: A Real Passionate Kiss Should Feel Like Dying [10w] Like ice melting into water coming to a rolling boil.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: When he kissed me, his lips soft and careful, it was all the thrill of our first kiss and all the practiced familiarity of the accumulated memory of all our kisses.
author: Maggie Stiefvater,  Linger

quote: Don't kiss me like a woman if you're going to treat me like a child.
author: Jeaniene Frost,  Halfway to the Grave

quote: A Kiss is a terrible name for a piece of chocolate shaped like a water droplet, because kisses are hot and would melt chocolate—even if it is wearing an astronaut suit made out of tinfoil.
author: Jarod Kintz,  At even one penny, this book would be overpriced. In fact, free is too expensive, because you'd still waste time by reading it.

quote: You can use your mouth to speak the words I love you, or you can use your mouth to kiss me and transport love from your mind to my heart.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Close your eyes and I'll kiss you, Tomorrow I'll miss you.
author: Paul McCartney

quote: You've got an awfully kissable mouth.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  Gatsby Girls

quote: In the afternoon, they stopped to eat on a rocky outcrop. Perry brushed a kiss on her cheek while she was chewing, and she learned that it was the loveliest thing to be kissed for no reason, even while chewing food. It brightened the woods, and the never sky, and everything.
author: Veronica Rossi,  Under the Never Sky

quote: Soul meets soul on lovers lips.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: We were kissing.I thought: This is good.I thought: I am not bad at this kissing. Not bad at all.I thought: I am clearly the greatest kisser in the history of the universe.Suddenly she laughed and pulled away from me. She wiggled a hand out of her sleeping bag and wiped her face. "You slobbered on my nose,"she said, and laughed
author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska
